about_the_game:
The darkness surrounds you, as a small gnome you have no other option other than moving forward; every jump and every move is a jump in the dark that could lead you to failure.

As your memory is still intact you have to return to the surface to prevent another disaster from falling upon the earth. Never forget what happened to your brothers in arms and the innocents. Use this to move yourself and reach the top, to illuminate the darkness before you and to prevent the destruction of the world.

 

You are just a gnome on the bottom of a dark pit using a small light to show you the way up

animals stands in your way threatening your progression.

 

This Indie game will test your patience and skills. While moving upwards, you'll have to adapt to the environment and learn how to use the movement at your advantage.

 

Prepare yourself for a couple of hours of... (meaby many more) gameplay, enjoy the experience of reaching the top in like 4 hours and then looking at a speedrun on youtube that complete the game in 4 minutes but most importantly rage out the game like 20 times because you messed up the same jump that one frustrating jump that you can't believe that is actually possible, but it is I swear that I've playtested it (kinda)!

The darkness surrounds you, as a small gnome you have no other option other than moving forward; every jump and every move is a jump in the dark that could lead you to failure.

As your memory is still intact you have to return to the surface to prevent another disaster from falling upon the earth. Never forget what happened to your brothers in arms and the innocents. Use this to move yourself and reach the top, to illuminate the darkness before you and to prevent the destruction of the world.

 

You are just a gnome on the bottom of a dark pit using a small light to show you the way up

animals stands in your way threatening your progression.

 

This Indie game will test your patience and skills. While moving upwards, you'll have to adapt to the environment and learn how to use the movement at your advantage.

 

Prepare yourself for a couple of hours of... name: Gnome adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: none
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: idk it's not really heavy just use a decent pc and you should be ok
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: none
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: any computer that is capable of running Getting over it

short_description: Find your way in the dark and climb up the walls of a cave, avoiding danger; reach the outside to warn the world of impending doom.
